agency_desc: A commercial organization that operates a free-to-use website and mobile app that tracks prescription drug prices and offers drug coupons.
service_description: Provides a free prescription discount card; plastic card may be ordered for free. The card is not valid for use with Medicaid or Medicare but may be used instead of health insurance if the price is lower. Cardholders may receive up to 80% discount at participating pharmacies.
site_details: Call or visit the website for information.

agency_desc: A national nonprofit organization that provides a helpline fro parents to call to receive support from trained advocates.
service_description: Provides a telephone counseling and information line that parents and caregivers of children and youth of all ages can call for advice, emotional support, problem-solving, or to get referrals for parenting resources.
site_eligibility: Parents and caregivers of children and youth of all ages

agency_desc: A 12-Step program offering for persons with a desire to stop gambling. The central office provides a website with information on meetings nationwide.
service_description: Offers support and fellowship for men and women with a desire to stop gambling. Group members share their experience, strength, and hope with each other as part of the addiction recovery process. Groups meet at various times and locations throughout the state.
site_details: Visit the website to locate a meeting or call to speak with someone.
site_schedule: Website and hotline daily 24 hours -- Meetings: Vary
site_eligibility: Closed Meetings: Only persons with a desire to stop gambling -- Open Meetings: The gambler; spouses, family, and friends of the gambler are welcome

agency_desc: A 12-Step program offering for persons with a desire to stop gambling. The central office provides a website with information on meetings nationwide.
service_description: Offers support and fellowship for men and women with a desire to stop gambling. Group members share their experience, strength, and hope with each other as part of the addiction recovery process. Groups meet at various times and locations throughout the state.
taxonomy_category: Mental Health and Substance Use Disorder Services
site_details: Visit the website to locate a meeting or call to speak with someone.
site_schedule: Website and hotline daily 24 hours -- Meetings: Vary
site_eligibility: Closed Meetings: Only persons with a desire to stop gambling -- Open Meetings: The gambler; spouses, family, and friends of the gambler are welcome

agency_desc: A Twelve Step Recovery group for persons who are addicted to Crystal Meth.
service_description: Offers self-help support groups for people who are addicted to crystal methamphetamine ("crystal meth"). Members help each other stay drug-free and share recovery experiences.
site_details: Visit website for meeting times and locations. Walk in to meeting or call the helpline for information.
site_schedule: Helpline: Voicemail available daily 24 hours -- Meetings: Vary by meeting location
site_eligibility: People who are (or think they may be) addicted to crystal meth

agency_desc: A worldwide nonprofit organization that offers a twelve step program affected by someone else’s addiction, drugs or narcotics.
service_description: Providing Nar-Anon, family support group for family members of individuals, for those affected by someone else’s addiction, drugs or narcotics
taxonomy_name: Families/Friends of Individuals With a Drug Use Disorder Support Groups
nameLevel5: Families/Friends of Individuals With a Drug Use Disorder Support Groups
site_details: Call or visit the website for meeting dates and times.
